name: Herding Cats (Austin Kidd, Owen Kidd, shayster, virodoran)
name_original: Herding Cats (Austin Kidd, Owen Kidd, shayster, virodoran)
description:
Be a cat, create chaos, rave (check the tasklist!)

   WASD - move

   E or click - swipe/interact

   Tab - view objectives

   Esc - menu (includes mouse sensitivity options!)
